metadata.name: Bedrich Smetana & Antonin Dvorak - 3D Model
metadata.description:
A dual anamorphic installation depicting the Czech composers Bedřich Smetana and Antonín Dvořák. The installation is made of various types of musical instruments, sheet music for Smetana’s symphonic poem ‘Vltava’, a vinyl of ‘My Fatherland’, a sound-proofed ear, jacks, a disco-ball, and a lot of various parts of musical instruments.

The installation is created from 486 physical objects and on display in permanent exhibit at Illusion Art Museum Prague.

This NFT is an interactive 3D model of a photogrammetric scan created from 413 photos (64Mpx ) of the real installation.

Vertices: 250 000
Resolution: 8K
Size: 33,5 MB
Format: GLB

The interactive 3D model could be explored in VR and AR, virtual galleries, games, etc. Navigate the camera to the right viewing angle.

Winner of the auction will get also exclusive print of each composer from the limited edition 10/10 in size 61x76,2 cm.

It is very first dual anamorphic 3D model as only one original NFT 1/1

Artwork made by Patrik Prosko
